column5: I picked up some Ridge line Cranks from Wholesale sports. Going to give them a try. Anyone try these yet they are New but I'm told you can troll them at high speed and the colors seem Good. Once the water slows down and clears a bit. I'm hitting the Water. Any info would be great.

The Ridgeline has worked well for me. I use the 2.5 and 3" sizes the most often and they catch walleye, crappie and bass really well. My favorite colors are the pearl chartreuse and firetiger. What are you going fishing for?
